item.title: Why Stopping Vim Now
item.description: While learning more about tools for the trade, vim was the tool that was thrown at me a lot. This tool took a long time, because I went the wrong route and was trying to use it as IDE not how it was intended. The way I started was at first, moved to config and plugin, instead of getting comfortable with vim-help, docs or core-vim without any setting. I learnt a few things here like vim-fugitive, it’s a great plugin, and alone it makes vim a treat to use.
